title: Colombian drug lord to be sent to US after capture
content: US officials had placed a $5m (£3.6m) bounty on the head of Otoniel, Colombia's most wanted drug lord.

title: Friends actor James Michael Tyler dies aged 59
content: The US actor, who played Gunther on the show, had been diagnosed with stage four prostate cancer.

title: Opposition calls for Covid restrictions in England
content: The UK chancellor says, however, that the data does not suggest "immediately" moving to a back-up plan.

title: Facebook whistleblower meets safe content activist
content: Frances Haugen meets Ian Russell, whose daughter died by suicide after viewing disturbing content.

title: Vigil held for cinematographer Halyna Hutchins
content: The cinematographer was fatally shot by a prop gun while filming for western movie Rust.

title: Superfan finally enjoys 6,000th rollercoaster ride
content: Covid left him waiting to pass the milestone after 25 years of enjoying the wooden rollercoaster.

title: Evacuations as ship spews toxic gas off Canada
content: The Zim Kingston ship is burning but officials said there is no safety risk to people on land.

title: Kobe Bryant's wife first heard of his death online
content: Vanessa Bryant said she learned about the death of her husband by seeing "RIP Kobe" notifications.

title: Zaghari-Ratcliffe husband begins new hunger strike
content: Aid worker Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe is distraught at the prospect of returning to jail, her husband says.

title: Man Utd thrashed at home by Liverpool
content: Mohamed Salah scores a hat-trick and Paul Pogba is sent off as clinical Liverpool embarrass Manchester United 5-0 at Old Trafford.

title: Pakistan hammer India at T20 World Cup
content: Pakistan hammer India by 10 wickets to claim a famous win over their great rivals at the Men's T20 World Cup in Dubai.

title: Deadly explosion at Uganda bar after terror warning
content: The suspected terrorist bombing comes a week after the UK warned about a possible attack.

title: German far-right group attempt to block migrants
content: Police have stopped vigilantes armed with batons, pepper spray and a machete at the Polish border.

title: Ed Sheeran tests positive for Covid-19
content: The singer-songwriter says he will be "self-isolating and following government guidelines".
